name: Planetary Racing Game
description:
This is a simple racing game there are no other vehicles so you are just racing against your own best time. There are 2 laps around 2 planets both have different gravitational pulls on your car. There is a basic gear system which will stall your car if you enter into a gear whilst not going fast enough or if you crash. You can also spin your car if you happen to land upside-down or just want to have fun doing barrel roles in the air, but once your wheels are on the ground you can no longer roll.
If you get confused as to where the next checkpoint is just follow the arrow!

Controls:
W - Accelerate (when in gear 1 or above)
S - Reverse (when in gear R)
A - Steer Left
D - Steer Right
Q - Roll Counter Clockwise
E - Roll Clockwise
Up Arrow - Go Up a gear (exit neutral)
Down Arrow - Go down a gear/Enter reverse (exit neutral)
